segments.text: I observe the angled view of the kitchen, taking it all in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman faces left, towel in hand, plate shining.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet runs steadily, but the basin overflows silently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water sheets down the front, pooling at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To the side, dishes stack neatly on the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window frames a serene garden path with bushes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains tied back, letting daylight flood in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy climbs the stool, reaching high for the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's labeled clearly, full of treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl stands nearby, arm extended expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool tilts back, adding unexpected tension.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Everything seems ordinary, yet hazards lurk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinets highlight their sneaky quest.
segments.speaker: PAR
